nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Entering upper atmosphere. Turbulence is 40% above predicted models. The planet's crystal spires are generating massive electrical discharges.

choices.text: Chen, find us a calmer approach vector.
No deviations. Power through the storm.
[Previous Loop] "There's a thermal updraft on the leeward side of the largest spire. Use it to cushion our descent."

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: There's a gap in the storm front 200 kilometers north, but it's closing fast. We can try to thread it, but it'll be tight. Or we can ride a lightning channel down, using its magnetic field to stabilize us. Risky, but fast.

choices.text: [Piloting] Go for the gap. Precision flying.
[Science] Ride the lightning. Kim, give Chen the discharge timings.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Landing party is strapped in and ready, Captain. We can handle a rough landing, but the shuttle might not. Your call.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Acknowledged. Hull integrity is dropping. Brace for impact.

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: An updraft? My scans show nothing... but if you say so, Captain. Adjusting our angle of attack.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Touchdown complete. Zero stress on the hull. A perfect landing, against all odds.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Touchdown. We've sustained minor hull damage, but the landing was successful.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Brace! Brace! Brace! Mayday, mayday, we are going down! Hull breach on decks 4 and 5!

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have landed safely and flawlessly.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have landed safely, with minor damage to the ship.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have crash-landed. The mission continues, but your ship is in a critical state.
